thread.title: Comment on Mississippi State is ready for a BLACKOUT by Carolyn
thread.title_full: Comment on Mississippi State is ready for a BLACKOUT by Carolyn

author: Carolyn
title: Comment on Mississippi State is ready for a BLACKOUT by Carolyn
text:
Posted in Football , Main | 10 Responses 
Davis Wade Stadium will be painted black Saturday evening when the Bulldogs host your University of Kentucky Wildcats in the cross-divisional rivalry. Mississippi State released a new video for the game, featuring the sweet sounds of Ciara‚Äôs new song, ‚ÄúPaint It, Black.‚Äù 
Wear white if you‚Äôre going to the game. With blue, of course. Retweet if you're wearing Black to the game Saturday! #HailState #AllBlackEverything https://t.co/eH66hDYhwR 
‚Äî MSU Football (@HailStateFB) October 21, 2015 
Confession: I like that song. Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 10 responses to ‚ÄúMississippi State is ready for a BLACKOUT‚Äù Jerad October 22, 2015 at 4:41   
I heard another version the other day of this song. Can she sue the Roling Stones for ripping her off? Dieter October 22, 2015 at 5:06   
Watching other teams‚Äô pump up stuff makes me so thankful for KY Wildcats TV. They produce much more diverse and engaging content than most other similar outfits around the country. 8 god October 22, 2015 at 5:51   
Clever with the line about the sea of blue or whatever. DylanG October 22, 2015 at 5:52   
That song should NEVER be covered. Rolling Stones should sue her ass. Aukfandude October 22, 2015 at 6:38   
Anybody else scared we will lose by 21+? Losing to a bad Auburn team at home and almost losing to Eastern. Our D has looked bad lately and mobile qb‚Äôs hurt us every time. Not feeling confident about this one. Ha! October 22, 2015 at 6:49 pm | Permalink 
You should feel confident about three things: 
1. You basketball program is the laughingstock of the nation 2. You will be searching for a coach very soon 3. That coach will also be owned by Calipari (I see UCLA-type beat downs in your future) 
Thanks for visiting. Have a nice next couple of years. üòâ 
#LittleBrothel Aukfandude October 22, 2015 at 7:21 pm | Permalink 
I am a UK fan. Why does everyone with any negative comment have to be a non fan? Just think were outmatched n this one and its a road game. Is everyone that way on here? Ha! October 22, 2015 at 8:21 pm | Permalink 
Typical troll response. Just save it, bro. 
#L1C4nicate October 22, 2015 at 6:58   
We‚Äôre everyone‚Äôs Superbowl‚Ä¶? Carolyn October 23, 2015 at 1:22 am | Permalink | Reply 
Saw this on their site a while back and have been planning since. All white with aome touchds of blue. I leVe at 6 an Saturday morning to drive doen, I can‚Äôt wait! FYI: Georgia is ALSO blacking out against us. üòä Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
